subject: RXIL-TReDS - Registration Approved
body:
{{{header}}} Dear Sir/Madam,


Your registration on the TReDS platform of RXIL has been approved.


Please use the following credentials for signing into the TReDS portal:
Member ID{{memberCode}}
LogIn ID{{loginId}}


A separate email will be sent to you with the password.
You are requested to ensure the following to activate your account for the transactions.

(i) Please change the password at the time of first login and set the two factor authentication preferences.
(ii) Please donot disclose the Member ID, Login ID and password to any one.

{{{footer}}}
